text: Robert Mayer – der Arzt aus Heilbronn is an East German film. It was released in 1955. ==External links== * Category:1955 films Category:1950s biographical films Category:German biographical films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films set in the 1830s Category:Films set in the 1840s
title: Robert Mayer – der Arzt aus Heilbronn
